DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effectiveness osteopathic manipulation decrease angina pectoris symptom .
DOC.criteria: Canadian Cardiovascular Society Class II , III minimum 6 month document coronary artery disease via previous myocardial infarction , abnormal stress test , abnormal coronary angiogram great equal 50 % luminal obstruction least one epicardial vessel . severe leave ventricular dysfunction symptomatic heart failure symptomatic aortic stenosis valvular disease significant pulmonary disease unstable angina major surgery angioplasty past three month acute myocardial infarction within past three month insulin dependent diabetes mellitus uncontrolled hypertension acute renal hepatic failure currently treat osteopathic manipulation
